Get KOSTRA

Source: R/KOSTRA_timeseries.R
get_KOSTRA.Rd

Get KOSTRA

get_KOSTRA(
  path = system.file("extdata/KOSTRA", package = "r2q"),
  coord_vector = c(3813634.44, 2753912.5),
  location_name = "Herne",
  base_name = "GIS_KOSTRA-DWD-2010R_D",
  duration_string = "0060",
  plot = TRUE
)

Arguments

path

path to shapefiles (default: system.file("extdata/KOSTRA", package = "r2q"))
coord_vector

coordinates in 3034
location_name

default: "Herne"
base_name

default: "GIS_KOSTRA-DWD-2010R_D"
duration_string

default: "0060"
plot

boolean (TRUE for plotting or FALSE if plotting is not required)

Value

Return list with elements "plot" and "data" (numeric results) and also produce a ggplot2 plot if parameter plot = TRUE)

Examples

link_to_coord_help <- "https://epsg.io/transform#s_srs=4326&t_srs=3034"
  
# Example default values Herne
herne <- get_KOSTRA()

#> Reading layer `StatRR_KOSTRA-DWD-2010R_D0060' from data source `/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/r2q/extdata/KOSTRA/GIS_KOSTRA-DWD-2010R_D0060' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
#> Simple feature collection with 8453 features and 10 fields
#> geometry type:  POLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 3710675 ymin: 2271848 xmax: 4354525 ymax: 3149248
#> projected CRS:  ETRS89_LCC_Europe
herne$plot

herne$data

# Example 10 min for Berlin
berlin <- get_KOSTRA(coord_vector = c(4217676.98, 2862423.69),
duration_string = "0010", location_name = "Berlin", plot = TRUE)

#> Reading layer `StatRR_KOSTRA-DWD-2010R_D0010' from data source `/Users/runner/work/_temp/Library/r2q/extdata/KOSTRA/GIS_KOSTRA-DWD-2010R_D0010' using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
#> Simple feature collection with 8453 features and 10 fields
#> geometry type:  POLYGON
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: 3710675 ymin: 2271848 xmax: 4354525 ymax: 3149248
#> projected CRS:  ETRS89_LCC_Europe
berlin$plot
